source:
filePath = 'https://asdevdmaicstor01.dfs.core.windows.net/qmi-mappings/qmi-mappingsLand/QMI_Reporting_Mappings.xlsx'
sasToken = '?sv=2020-10-02&ss=btqf&srt=sco&st=2022-07-05T06%3A47%3A14Z&se=2040-06-01T06%3A47%3A00Z&sp=rwdxl&sig=mBl%2Bl3Phz%2Bhgt7gg3i2EWueohnIlM%2B8tbBUwIvWwTy8%3D'
sheetName = 'Reporting_Structure'
etlRunID = '1'
tableName = 'TBL_REF_MAN_QMI_REPORTING_STRUCTURE'
schema = 'RDV'
database = 'aztsaasdmaicdevsqlpools01'
server = 'az-tsa-as-dmaic-dev-synapse-01.sql.azuresynapse.net'

strSQL = ("SELECT \n" 
"\tOrganisationId as MAN_QMI_REPORTING_STRUCTURE_BK\n"
"\t,OrganisationId as ORGANISATION_ID\n"
"\t,Name_1 as NAME_1\n"
"\t,Name_2 as NAME_2\n"
"\t,Name_3 as NAME_3\n"
"\t,Name_4 as NAME_4\n"
"\t,Archived as ARCHIVED\n"
"\t,Portfolio as PORTFOLIO\n"
"\t,Mission_Expression as MISSION_EXPRESSION\n"
"\t,Stream_Department as STREAM_DEPARTMENT\n"
"\t,Specific_Service as SPECIFIC_SERVICE\n"

"\t,'Manual' as ETL_RECORD_SOURCE\n"
"\t,true AS ETL_RECORD_IS_ACTIVE\n"
"\t,'A' as ETL_RECORD_STATUS\n"
"\t,'"+ etlRunID +"' as ETL_INSERT_RUN_ID\n"
"\t,'"+ etlRunID +"' as ETL_UPDATE_RUN_ID\n"
"\t,to_timestamp('"+strloadTime+"') as ETL_RECORD_INSERT_DATETIME\n"
"\t,to_timestamp('"+strloadTime+"') as ETL_RECORD_UPDATE_DATETIME\n"
"\t,'"+etlLoadID+"' AS ETL_LOAD_ID\n"
"FROM\n"
"\t "+tempTableName)

path = filePath + sasToken
pdf = readexcel(path,sheetName)
pdf = pdf.replace({np.nan: None})

pdf_schema = StructType([StructField("OrganisationId", IntegerType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Name_1", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Name_2", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Name_3", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Name_4", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Archived", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Portfolio", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Mission_Expression", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Stream_Department", StringType(), True)\
                    ,StructField("Specific_Service", StringType(), True)])

df = spark.createDataFrame(pdf, schema=pdf_schema)

df.createOrReplaceTempView(tempTableName)
sqlDF = spark.sql(strSQL)
#display(sqlDF)
